name: Zoomed Out - An Interactive Online Magic Show
content: Don't miss this chance to see award winning magician Nathaniel Segal perform a one of a kind online magic show live and streamed directly to you! You will get to see magic you have never seen before from his acclaimed Zoom show. Minds will be read, magic will happen in your hands, and you will get to see close up magic done in a way that you wouldn't get to see even if in person! The show is full of both impressive magic and sophisticated technical production value. Nathaniel combines magic with humor and the result is an incredibly fun and high energy show that's great for magic enthusiasts and skeptics alike! You will even get to see magic that can be seen on national TV! You will need Zoom to enjoy the show. Please ensure that you have downloaded the latest version prior to the show. Also please make sure you have access to either a printer or pen and paper as well as a pair of scissors. There are two dates: Saturday, March 27th or Saturday, April 3rd at 5:30 PM (PST). Tickets are $20 per login and is good for your whole household. See you at the show! See SegalMagic.com for more info.
